sections.heading: Criminal mortgage rescue fraud
sections.text: A person commits the offense of criminal mortgage rescue fraud when he or she intentionally violates any provision enumerated in Section 50 of this Act.

sections.heading: Criminal penalties.   A person who commits the offense of criminal mortgage rescue fraud is guilty of a Class 2 felony.
